mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet_profile (user_id, pet_name, pet_type, breed, gender, birthday, color, weight, description, avatar, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_type}, #{breed}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{color}, #{weight}, #{description}, #{avatar}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM health_record WHERE pet_id = p.id) as health_record_count FROM pet_profile p WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT p.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM health_record WHERE pet_id = p.id) as health_record_count FROM pet_profile p WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE pet_profile SET pet_name = #{pet_name}, pet_type = #{pet_type}, breed = #{breed}, gender = #{gender}, birthday = #{birthday}, color = #{color}, weight = #{weight}, description = #{description}, avatar = #{avatar}, update_time = #{update_time} WHERE id = #{id}
